pkgmetadata.longdescription: Induced Priors in Bayesian Mixture Models // Computes implicitly induced quantities from prior/hyperparameter specifications of three Mixtures of Finite Mixtures models: Dirichlet Process Mixtures (DPMs; Escobar and West (1995) doi:10.1080/01621459.1995.10476550), Static Mixtures of Finite Mixtures (Static MFMs; Miller and Harrison (2018) doi:10.1080/01621459.2016.1255636), and Dynamic Mixtures of Finite Mixtures (Dynamic MFMs; Frhwirth-Schnatter, Malsiner- Walli and Grn (2020) arXiv:2005.09918). For methodological details, please refer to Greve, Grn, Malsiner-Walli and Frhwirth-Schnatter (2020) arXiv:2012.12337) as well as the package vignette.
